channel.title: Achievements not working?
channel.description:
Well, the game itself works flawlessly, but whenever I select "Achievements" in the main menu, it give me the following message:
"You must be logged into Steam to unlock or view achievements"
And I assure you, I'm logged into Steam just fine, so I have no idea what can be causing it. Is this because the game isn't officially on Steam yet, or is it a bug specific to me? I talked to my friends, and they say that while still kinda buggy, they can view their achievements fine. It kinda bugs me, I'm a bit obsessed with achievements :stuck_out_tongue:
Any help would be appreciated.
